zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix

类 NumberMatrix<ImplementationType extends Matrix<?,?,?,?,?>,ElementType extends Number,ArrayType,ArraysType>

  • java.lang.Object
    • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.vector.Vector<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType>
      • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.vector.ASVector<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType>
        • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix.Matrix<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType,ArrayType,ArraysType>
          • zhao.algorithmMagic.operands.matrix.NumberMatrix<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType,ArraysType>
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Iterable<ArrayType>, Operands<ImplementationType>
    直接已知子类:
    DoubleMatrix, IntegerMatrix

    public abstract class NumberMatrix<ImplementationType extends Matrix<?,?,?,?,?>,ElementType extends Number,ArrayType,ArraysType>
extends Matrix<ImplementationType,ElementType,ArrayType,ArrayType,ArraysType>
    数值矩阵，其中的每一个元素都应是一个数值类型的对象，数值矩阵支持维度选择等函数。

    Numeric matrix, in which each element should be an object of numerical type. Numeric matrix supports functions such as dimension selection.

    作者:
    zhao
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NumberMatrix

        protected NumberMatrix(int rowCount,
                       int colCount,
                       ArraysType arraysType)
        构造一个空的矩阵，指定其矩阵的行列数

        Constructs an empty matrix, specifying the number of rows and columns of its matrix

        参数:
        rowCount - 矩阵中的行数量

        the number of rows in the matrix

        colCount - 矩阵中的列数量

        arraysType - 该矩阵对象中的二维数组对象。

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNumberOfDimensions

        public final int getNumberOfDimensions()
        指定者:
        getNumberOfDimensions 在类中 Vector<ImplementationType extends Matrix<?,?,?,?,?>,ElementType extends Number,ArrayType>
        返回:
        矩阵中包含的维度数量，这里是矩阵的行列之积

        the number of dimensions contained in the vector

      • add

        public abstract ImplementationType add(Vector<?,?,?> value)
        将两个操作数进行求和的方法，具体用法请参阅API说明。

        The method for summing two operands, please refer to the API description for specific usage.

        参数:
        value - 被求和的参数 Parameters to be summed
        返回:
        求和之后的数值 the value after the sum

        There is no description for the super interface, please refer to the subclass documentation

      • diff

        public abstract ImplementationType diff(Vector<?,?,?> value)
        在两个操作数之间做差的方法，具体用法请参阅API说明。

        The method of making a difference between two operands, please refer to the API description for specific usage.

        参数:
        value - 被做差的参数（被减数） The parameter to be subtracted (minuend)
        返回:
        差异数值 difference value There is no description for the super interface, please refer to the subclass documentation

      • featureSelection

        public abstract ImplementationType featureSelection(double threshold)
        去除冗余特征维度，将当前矩阵中的每一个维度都进行方差或无向差计算，并将过于稳定的冗余特征去除。

        Remove redundant feature dimensions, calculate variance or undirected difference of each dimension in the current matrix, and remove redundant features that are too stable.

        参数:
        threshold - 去除阈值，代表去除的维度数量是当前所有维度数量的百分之threshold，小于0.01将认为不进行去除

        Removal threshold, which means that the number of dimensions removed is the threshold of the current number of all dimensions. If it is less than 0.01, it will be considered not to be removed

        返回:
        去除冗余特征维度之后的新矩阵

        New matrix after removing redundant feature dimensions

      • deleteRelatedDimensions

        public abstract ImplementationType deleteRelatedDimensions(int index,
                                                           double thresholdLeft,
                                                           double thresholdRight)
        删除与目标索引维度相关的所有行维度，并返回新矩阵对象。

        Delete all row dimensions related to the target index dimension and return a new matrix object.

        参数:
        index - 需要被作为相关系数中心点的行编号。

        The row number to be used as the center point of the correlation coefficient.

        thresholdLeft - 相关系数阈值，需要被删除的相关系数阈值区间左边界。

        The correlation coefficient threshold is the left boundary of the correlation coefficient threshold interval to be deleted.

        thresholdRight - 相关系数阈值，需要被删除的相关系数阈值区间右边界。

        The correlation coefficient threshold is the right boundary of the correlation coefficient threshold interval to be deleted.

        返回:
        进行了相关维度删除之后构造出来的新矩阵

        The new matrix constructed after deleting relevant dimensions

      • extractMat

        public abstract ImplementationType extractMat(int x1,
                                              int y1,
                                              int x2,
                                              int y2)
        提取出子矩阵对象
        参数:
        x1 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的起始坐标点。

        The starting coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        y1 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的起始坐标点。

        The starting coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        x2 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的终止坐标点。

        The end coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        y2 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的终止坐标点。

        The end coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        返回:
        整形矩阵对象中的子矩阵对象。

      • extractSrcMat

        public abstract ImplementationType extractSrcMat(int y1,
                                                 int y2)
        提取出子矩阵对象
        参数:
        y1 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的起始坐标点。

        The starting coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        y2 - 被提取矩阵在原矩阵中的终止坐标点。

        The end coordinate point of the extracted matrix in the original matrix.

        返回:
        整形矩阵对象中的子矩阵对象。
